entry.def: A gambler is someone who gambles regularly, for example in card games or horse racing.
If you describe someone as a gambler, you mean that they are ready to take risks in order to gain advantages or success.

example.ex: He had never been afraid of failure: he was a gambler, ready to go off somewhere else and start all over again.
example.tran: 他从来都不害怕失败：他是个冒险家，随时准备到别处从头再来。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who wagers money on the outcome of games or sporting events
2. someone who risks loss or injury in the hope of gain or excitement
